nodes.excerpt: Join 60K+ conversation designers, developers & teams using Voiceflow to design, prototype & launch conversational experiences. ⠀ Launch live apps to Alexa/Google without code or use our new SDK to launch to any conversational channel w/ any custom tech stack.
nodes.title: Voiceflow 2.0 - Design, prototype and launch chat/voice apps with no code
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 加入60K+对话设计师、开发者和团队，使用Voiceflow设计、原型和发布对话体验。⠀ 无需代码即可向Alexa/Google发布实时应用程序，或使用我们新的SDK向任何对话渠道/任何自定义技术栈发布。
localize.tagline: 无需代码，即可设计、制作原型并发布聊天/语音应用。

localize.description: 加入60K+對話設計師、開發者和團隊，使用Voiceflow設計、原型和發佈對話體驗。⠀ 無需代碼即可向Alexa/Google發佈實時應用程序，或使用我們新的SDK向任何對話渠道/任何自定義技術棧發佈。
localize.tagline: 無需代碼，即可設計、製作原型併發布聊天/語音應用。

nodes.excerpt: With this new Zapier plugin, Bubble apps can create both “triggers” or “actions” for a Zap. This lets you do everything from trigger workflows to add, delete, and modify things in your Bubble app database with any web service in Zapier’s extensive library.
nodes.title: Official Bubble Zapier Integration - Connect any web service to a no-code web app.
nodes.author: Vivienne Chen

localize.description: 通过这个新的Zapier插件，Bubble应用程序可以为Zap创建 "触发器 "或 "动作"。这让你可以通过Zapier广泛的库中的任何网络服务，在你的Bubble应用数据库中完成从触发工作流到添加、删除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 将任何网络服务连接到一个无代码的网络应用。

localize.description: 通過這個新的Zapier插件，Bubble應用程序可以爲Zap創建 "觸發器 "或 "動作"。這讓你可以通過Zapier廣泛的庫中的任何網絡服務，在你的Bubble應用數據庫中完成從觸發工作流到添加、刪除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 將任何網絡服務連接到一個無代碼的網絡應用。

nodes.excerpt: A durable and sleek card carry solution to help you move effortlessly through your day. Easily scan your ID, access or public transport card – custom-designed to be more durable and silent compared to standard retractors.

nodes.excerpt: Find the perfect time across multiple time zones. We have our coworkers, family and friends distributed across the globe. Knowing what time overlaps can get tricky. We created Nomad Time to have a simple, fast and delightful experience.
nodes.title: Nomad Time - A friendly time zone converter
nodes.author: Rafael Chiti

localize.description: 跨越多个时区寻找完美时间。我们的同事、家人和朋友分布在全球各地。知道什么时间重叠可能会变得很棘手。我们创建了Nomad Time，以获得简单、快速和愉悦的体验。
localize.tagline: 一个友好的时区转换器

localize.description: 跨越多個時區尋找完美時間。我們的同事、家人和朋友分佈在全球各地。知道什麼時間重疊可能會變得很棘手。我們創建了Nomad Time，以獲得簡單、快速和愉悅的體驗。
localize.tagline: 一個友好的時區轉換器

nodes.excerpt: With Versoly changelog you can add custom fonts, analytics, custom domain, embeddable widget, SEO (pagination, sitemap, metatags) and give your whole team access.

nodes.excerpt: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.

localize.description: Zepel是一款项目管理软件，它不仅仅是简单的问题跟踪。通过这种方式，您可以规划功能，跟踪整个产品开发过程的进展，并以客户为中心的软件无痛地发货。
localize.tagline: 软件产品团队的Jira替代方案

nodes.excerpt: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developers’ preferred built-in IDE.

nodes.excerpt: Design Cell is a growing collection of elements and styles for iOS app creation. The first version includes more than 800 elements and 20 ready-to-use sample screens. Experience a convenient workflow in your favorite design area and get things done faster.
nodes.title: Design Cell - Beautiful multipurpose mockups for iOS
nodes.author: Anastasiya Yavorskaya

localize.description: Design Cell是一个不断增长的iOS应用创建元素和样式的集合。第一个版本包括800多个元素和20个随时可用的样屏。在您喜爱的设计区域体验便捷的工作流程，更快地完成任务。
localize.tagline: 美丽的iOS多用途模拟程序

localize.description: Design Cell是一個不斷增長的iOS應用創建元素和樣式的集合。第一個版本包括800多個元素和20個隨時可用的樣屏。在您喜愛的設計區域體驗便捷的工作流程，更快地完成任務。
localize.tagline: 美麗的iOS多用途模擬程序

nodes.excerpt: Prop Hero is an interactive gaming platform that allows fans of live sports to compete in the action by correctly predicting what is going to happen while they watch. Prop Hero can be embedded into broadcast streams or used as a second screen experience.
nodes.title: Prop Hero - Interactive predictor games for live sports
nodes.author: Daniel Greenberg

localize.description: Prop Hero是一个互动游戏平台，让体育直播的粉丝们在观看的同时，通过正确预测将要发生的事情来进行竞争。Prop Hero可以嵌入到直播流中，也可以作为第二屏体验使用。
localize.tagline: 体育直播的互动预测游戏

localize.description: Prop Hero是一個互動遊戲平臺，讓體育直播的粉絲們在觀看的同時，通過正確預測將要發生的事情來進行競爭。Prop Hero可以嵌入到直播流中，也可以作爲第二屏體驗使用。
localize.tagline: 體育直播的互動預測遊戲

nodes.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
nodes.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams
nodes.author: Matthew Howells-Barby

localize.description: Weet是一个视频消息工具，它允许您与您的团队、合作伙伴和客户进行异步对话。Weet包括即时录音、屏幕共享、虚拟背景、视频过滤器、表情符号反应和丰富的评论选项。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的异步视频通信

localize.description: Weet是一個視頻消息工具，它允許您與您的團隊、合作伙伴和客戶進行異步對話。Weet包括即時錄音、屏幕共享、虛擬背景、視頻過濾器、表情符號反應和豐富的評論選項。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的異步視頻通信

nodes.excerpt: Every time we switch context, it takes us way longer to finish a task at hand. Aerotime creates space for deep work by stacking your meetings together & enables you to prioritize your most important tasks, in flow. Done across team, it saves even more hours.
nodes.title: Aerotime - Group meetings together and find time for deep work
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 每当我们切换上下文时，都会花费更多的时间来完成手头的任务。Aerotime通过将您的会议堆叠在一起，为深度工作创造空间，并使您能够在流程中优先处理最重要的任务。跨团队完成，可以节省更多的时间。
localize.tagline: 小组会议一起，找时间深入工作

localize.description: 每當我們切換上下文時，都會花費更多的時間來完成手頭的任務。Aerotime通過將您的會議堆疊在一起，爲深度工作創造空間，並使您能夠在流程中優先處理最重要的任務。跨團隊完成，可以節省更多的時間。
localize.tagline: 小組會議一起，找時間深入工作

nodes.excerpt: 🖼Browse 50+ templates — pitch decks, sales proposals, briefs, & more 💡Get inspired by stunning decks built to enhance collaboration 🎨Instantly apply different design styles to any slide 💬Easily customize templates to match your brand 👉 https://pitch.com/templates

localize.description: 🖼浏览50多个模板--推介会、销售建议、简报等 💡从为增强协作而构建的令人惊叹的幻灯片中获得灵感 🎨立即将不同的设计风格应用到任何幻灯片中 💬轻松定制模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates
localize.tagline: 专为大创意而设计，并可为任何故事定制。

localize.description: 🖼瀏覽50多個模板--推介會、銷售建議、簡報等 💡從爲增強協作而構建的令人驚歎的幻燈片中獲得靈感 🎨立即將不同的設計風格應用到任何幻燈片中 💬輕鬆定製模板以匹配您的品牌 👉 https://pitch.com/templates

nodes.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. 🤯
nodes.title: Weekend Club - The weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to ship faster
nodes.author: Charlie Ward

localize.description: 我们是引导者的第一周末联合办公俱乐部，让你保持积极性，得到有用的反馈，更快地完成项目。每周六格林威治标准时间和美国中部时间上午10点到下午5点，由专门的主持人通过Slack和Zoom进行实时会话。加上100+软件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 周末联合办公俱乐部，让引导者更快地出货。

localize.description: 我們是引導者的第一週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓你保持積極性，得到有用的反饋，更快地完成項目。每週六格林威治標準時間和美國中部時間上午10點到下午5點，由專門的主持人通過Slack和Zoom進行實時會話。加上100+軟件折扣。🤯
localize.tagline: 週末聯合辦公俱樂部，讓引導者更快地出貨。

nodes.excerpt: Product management can seem like a daunting discipline, but once you get a grasp of the fundamentals, and combine that with some intuition, you’ll be on your way to leading successful projects.
nodes.title: Product Manager's Guide - A product manager guide from product vision to product road
nodes.author: @Being Pavan Kumar

localize.description: 产品管理似乎是一门令人望而生畏的学科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再结合一些直觉，你就会走上成功领导项目的道路。

nodes.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.

nodes.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
nodes.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence
nodes.author: Joe Martin

localize.description: 升级的Zoom与蓝牙连接的键盘，让你运行Zoom与点击一个按钮。视频通话更容易与你最喜欢的22个Zoom快捷键在一个惊人的热键板。适用于Windows和Mac。
localize.tagline: 告别Zoom失败，自信沟通。

localize.tagline: 告別Zoom失敗，自信溝通。

nodes.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
nodes.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
nodes.author: Damir Bektilov

localize.description: 跟踪重要的任务和项目，创建即将到来的事件，保持笔记和控制费用在一个概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待办事项，或者看到你上周花了多少钱。

nodes.excerpt: Now you can be part of the Presearch Decentralized Search experience by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine while earning PRE tokens.

nodes.excerpt: Tweet Peep 👀 gives you instant, one-click access to what other people are saying about the articles and videos you're browsing. It shortens the great-minds-think-alike process. Let's peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter!
nodes.title: Tweet Peep - Peep other people’s thoughts on media across Twitter
nodes.author: Kazuki Nakayasiki

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 让您可以一键访问其他人对您正在浏览的文章和视频的评价。它缩短了伟大的头脑--想法--相似的过程。让我们在Twitter上偷看别人对媒体的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窥视其他人对媒体的想法。

localize.description: Tweet Peep 👀 讓您可以一鍵訪問其他人對您正在瀏覽的文章和視頻的評價。它縮短了偉大的頭腦--想法--相似的過程。讓我們在Twitter上偷看別人對媒體的看法吧!
localize.tagline: 在Twitter上窺視其他人對媒體的想法。

nodes.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
nodes.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
localize.tagline: 创建自己的股票指数

localize.description: Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!
localize.tagline: 創建自己的股票指數

nodes.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
nodes.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 您最喜爱的销售、营销和客户支持工具--erxes--现在可以随身携带。通过管理交易、回复信息和更新您的 CRM，随时保持球滚动。对于忙碌的日子，移动版 erxes 是您的最佳选择。
localize.tagline: 一些最重要的客户关系管理和网络聊天工具在路上。

localize.description: 您最喜愛的銷售、營銷和客戶支持工具--erxes--現在可以隨身攜帶。通過管理交易、回覆信息和更新您的 CRM，隨時保持球滾動。對於忙碌的日子，移動版 erxes 是您的最佳選擇。
localize.tagline: 一些最重要的客戶關係管理和網絡聊天工具在路上。

nodes.excerpt: Rarible is the first community-owned NFT marketplace. Create, sell or collect digital items secured with blockchain.
nodes.title: Rarible - Create, sell, collect digital items secured with blockchain
nodes.author: Gercek Armagan

localize.description: Rarible是第一个社区拥有的NFT市场。创建、出售或收集用区块链担保的数字项目。
localize.tagline: 创建、销售、收藏用区块链担保的数字项目。

localize.description: Rarible是第一個社區擁有的NFT市場。創建、出售或收集用區塊鏈擔保的數字項目。
localize.tagline: 創建、銷售、收藏用區塊鏈擔保的數字項目。
